long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT powered pop-up that allows you to quickly summarize and ask questions about the webpage you are currently viewing.  Get concise summaries with a single click -eliminating the need to toggle between tabs and manually paste into ChatGPT. 

The extension is neat and responsive. It saves conversations history and allows you to toggle between previously asked questions and copy answers with ease.

â€¢ Analyzing LinkedIn profiles: Quickly extract key information from LinkedIn profiles for background research.
â€¢ Learning new topics: Ask specific questions to clarify concepts or get summaries that facilitate faster learning.
â€¢ And much more: The possibilities are endless â€“ use it however you see fit
